name: MiamiCoin
description: MiamiCoin is the first CityCoin to market, activated by the community in August 2021. CityCoins give communities the power to improve and program their cities by unlocking a new funding mechanism for their city, and creating an open-source protocol for developers to build on. CityCoins are powered by Stacks, a protocol that enables smart contracts on the Bitcoin network. Visit citycoins.co to learn more or join the community Discord at discord.gg/citycoins.
